titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Longwill family photograph album
titlestmt.author: Jenny Johnson

acqinfo.p: This collection was given to Stanford University, Special Collections in 2015.

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research use. Audio-visual materials are not available in original format, and must be reformatted to a digital use copy.

userestrict.head: Ownership & Copyright
userestrict.p: All requests to reproduce, publish, quote from, or otherwise use collection materials must be submitted in writing to the Head of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, California 94305-6064. Consent is given on behalf of Special Collections as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission from the copyright owner. Such permission must be obtained from the copyright owner, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/spc/using-collections/permission-publish.
Restrictions also apply to digital representations of the original materials. Use of digital files is restricted to research and educational purposes.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: [identification of item], John "Jack" Longwill, Jr. photograph album (A0124). Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical note
bioghist.p: John "Jack" Longwill, Jr. earned his AB in Economics from Stanford University in 1946.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This album was owned by Jack Longwill, however, because of the date of creation, it is believed it belonged to one of his parents. Album contains photographs, many of which depict student life on the Stanford campus. Included are photographs of campus scenes, athletic events, social events, and off-campus outings. Also included are photographs of a military parade and outings to bay area and California parks and wilderness areas.
